MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the FK10 postcode area of Alloa, affecting properties in Charles Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of this at 00:47AM. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4AM. If this information changes we will make every effort to contact you. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:38AM on 28 April 2021.
